item.title: Swiss drugmakers Novartis and Roche ditch some diversity programs on U.S. concerns
item.description: Swiss drugmaker Roche has abandoned global diverse workforce targets, and compatriot Novartis is ending its use of diverse panels for U.S. hiring.

item.title: Turkish lira, stock market drop after Istanbul mayor and Erdogan rival arrested
item.description: Imamoglu, the popular 53-year-old mayor was seen as the next opposition party candidate for the Turkish presidency.
